title: Did Mark McCloskey Once Destroy a Neighboring Synagogue’s Beehives?
subtitle: Mark McCloskey and his wife, Patricia, infamously displayed two guns during a racial injustice protest outside of their Missouri mansion in 2020.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: Mark McCloskey, a Missouri man made famous for brandishing a firearm at protesters in 2020, destroyed a neighboring synagogue’s beehive seven years earlier because the structures crossed his property line.
